TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class EntityProviderFactory : System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory, IServiceProvider
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EntityProviderFactory extends System.Data.Common.DbProviderFactory implements class System.IServiceProvider

Docs.summary: Represents a set of methods for creating instances of a provider's implementation of the data source classes.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The EntityProviderFactory provides a common entry point to obtain <xref:System.Data.EntityClient> classes.
For conceptual information about how to use EntityProviderFactory, see [ADO.NET Entity Framework](../Topic/ADO.NET%20Entity%20Framework.md) and [DbProviderFactories](../Topic/DbProviderFactories.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.Common.DbCommand CreateCommand() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityCommand"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder CreateCommandBuilder() cil managed

Docs.summary: Throws a <see cref="T:System.NotSupportedException">. This method is currently not supported.
Docs.returns: This method is currently not supported.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.Common.DbConnection CreateConnection() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnection"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.Common.DbConnectionStringBuilder CreateConnectionStringBuilder() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityConnectionStringBuilder"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter CreateDataAdapter() cil managed

Docs.summary: CreateDataAdapter is not supported in this version of the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](../../add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Data.Common.DbParameter CreateParameter() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the <see cref="T:System.Data.EntityClient.EntityParameter"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Security.CodeAccessPermission CreatePermission(valuetype System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState state) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a new instance of the provider's class that implements the provider's version of the <see cref="T:System.Security.CodeAccessPermission"> class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance object System.IServiceProvider.GetService(class System.Type serviceType) cil managed

Docs.returns: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.IServiceProvider">. The supported types are <xref:System.Data.Common.DbProviderServices>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandDefinitionBuilder>, and <xref:System.Data.IEntityAdapter>. Returns null (or `Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](../../add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]) for every other type.
